Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(cli\): Complete all CLI commands with griot-core SDK integration

- T-031: griot validate command - validates data against contracts
- T-032: griot lint command - checks contracts for quality issues
- T-033: griot diff command - compares contract versions
- T-034: griot mock command - generates synthetic test data
- T-035: griot manifest command - exports AI/LLM metadata
- T-110: griot push command - pushes contracts to registry
- T-111: griot pull command - pulls contracts from registry

All commands properly integrated with griot-core SDK.
Updated output.py to handle Severity enum.
Updated board.md with completion status.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
